column15: The figures for total Union Budget expenditure, for 2017-18 RE and 2018-19 BE, do not include "Funds collected from GST Compensation Cess, which are transferred to a non-lapsable fund in the Public Account" of Rs. 61331 Crores & Rs. 90000 Crores respectively. Without adjusting for these figures, total Budget for these two years are: Rs. 2217750 Crores and Rs. 2442213 Crores respectively.
